description:
SoftBank founder and CEO Masayoshi Son has claimed that artificial super intelligence (ASI) could be a reality within the next decade. Speaking at SoftBank’s annual meeting in Tokyo on June 21, Son painted a picture of a future where AI far surpasses human intelligence, potentially revolutionising life as we know it. Son asserted that by... Read more »

The post SoftBank chief: Forget AGI, ASI will be here within 10 years appeared first on AI News.
title: SoftBank chief: Forget AGI, ASI will be here within 10 years

description:
Apple announced on Friday that it would block its highly anticipated Apple Intelligence AI features, iPhone Mirroring, and SharePlay Screen Sharing for EU users. While not entirely unexpected, this decision underscores the growing tension between rapid technological advancement and the EU’s stringent regulatory framework, particularly the Digital Markets Act (DMA) and General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). From the... Read more »

The post Apple’s EU AI delay: Innovation vs regulation appeared first on AI News.
title: Apple’s EU AI delay: Innovation vs regulation
